titleStmt.title: To SAMUEL CARTWRIGHT,Presumably Samuel Cartwright, Jnr (1815-91), dental surgeon: see PIlgrim Letters 7, p. 27n. Samuel, Jnr, became CDâ€™s dentist, but his father, Samuel, Snr, also a dental surgeon, practised at the same address. [?8 JULY 1852]
